Body:
""" page numbering- abbr """
segment = Segment("""first
second

p 1
""")
self.assertEquals(segment.segments, [{'tag': 1002, 'text': 'first\nsecond'},
    {'tag': 1003, 'text': 'p 1'}])
segment = Segment("""first
second

p. 1
""")
self.assertEquals(segment.segments, [{'tag': 1002, 'text': 'first\nsecond'},
    {'tag': 1003, 'text': 'p. 1'}])
